TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi MenuItemArray extends Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray implements class System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider
Public Class MenuItemArray Inherits BaseControlArray Implements IExtenderProvider

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: 提供 控制項的控制項陣列。

span.span: Provides a control array of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `MenuItemArray`類別提供對等項目執行階段功能的 Visual Basic 6.0`MenuItem`陣列。The `MenuItemArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 `MenuItem` array. 它不提供 Visual Basic 6.0 控制項陣列的設計階段功能。It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CanExtend`方法可用來判斷特定控制項是其他項目已從中複製的控制項陣列的基底項目。The `CanExtend` method can be used to determine whether a specific control is the base element of the control array from which the other elements were cloned. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 發生於按一下 中的 時。

span.span: Occurs when a in a is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Click`事件會傳遞至其事件處理常式。The `Click` event passes an to its event handler. 因此它只會顯示已發生按。Therefore it only indicates that a click has occurred. 如果您需要更多滑鼠資訊 （按鈕點選、 滾輪旋轉或位置的數目），使用事件。If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the event. 不過，如果按一下因滑鼠，例如按下 ENTER 鍵以外的其他動作，將不會引發事件。However, the event will not be raised if the click is caused by action other than that of the mouse, such as pressing the ENTER key. 按兩下是由使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定決定。A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 使用者可以設定應該才視為按兩下，而不是兩次按一下滑鼠按鍵的按一下之間的時間。The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click instead of two clicks. `Click`每當按兩下控制項時，就會引發事件。The `Click` event is raised every time that a control is double-clicked. 比方說，如果您有事件處理常式`Click`和事件[控制項](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm)、`Click`和按兩下控制項時，會呼叫這兩種方法時，會引發事件。For example, if you have event handlers for the `Click` and events of a [control](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm), the `Click` and events are raised when the control is double-clicked and both methods are called. 如果按兩下控制項時，以及控制項不支援事件，`Click`事件可能會引發兩次。If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the event, the `Click` event might be raised two times. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 發生於主控描繪 的視覺外觀變更時。

span.span: Occurs when a visual aspect of an owner-drawn changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件由描繪。This event is used by an owner-drawn . 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法從您的應用程式程式碼中呼叫這個方法。This method cannot be called from your application's code. 請改用 方法。Use the method instead. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法從您的應用程式程式碼中呼叫這個方法。This method cannot be called from your application's code. 使用`AddHandler`使用所新增的任何控制項的事件連結方法。Use `AddHandler` to hook up events for any controls that are added by using the method. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Item`屬性是控制項陣列的預設屬性。The `Item` property is the default property for a control array. 因此，下列程式碼是相等的。Therefore, the following lines of code are equivalent. ```vb MsgBox(CStr(MenuItemArray.Item(1).Text)) MsgBox(CStr(MenuItemArray(1).Text)) ``` > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 發生於每次需要繪製主控描繪 時。

span.span: Occurs each time an owner-drawn needs to be drawn.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以建立指定大小的項目會繪製前的此事件的事件處理常式事件。You can create an event handler for this event to specify the size an item is made before it is drawn in the event. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 發生於功能表項目的功能表項目清單顯示前。

span.span: Occurs before a menu item's list of menu items is displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有當功能表項目具有子功能表項目可以顯示時，就會發生這個事件。This event occurs only when a menu item has submenu items to display. 您可以使用此事件處理常式來新增、 移除、 啟用、 停用，請選取，或取消選取 根據您的應用程式的狀態，才能讓它們顯示的功能表項目。You can use this event handler to add, remove, enable, disable, check, or uncheck menu items based on the state of your application before they are displayed. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

span.span: The method is not supported in the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不支援這個方法，並呼叫它，則不會引發例外狀況。This method is not supported, and calling it does not raise an exception. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 發生於使用者將滑鼠指標停留在功能表項目上時。

span.span: Occurs when the user rests the mouse pointer over a menu item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在使用者將滑鼠指標停留在功能表項目上時，通常會引發這個事件。This event is typically raised when the user rests the mouse pointer over the menu item. 使用者會反白顯示功能表項目使用鍵盤來使用方向鍵捲動的功能表項目時，也可能引發此事件。The event can also be raised when the user highlights a menu item by using the keyboard to scroll to the menu item with the arrow keys. 您可以使用此事件，以顯示應用程式的狀態列中的這個功能表項目相關的詳細的說明字串。You can use this event to display a detailed Help string pertaining to this menu item in an application's status bar. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

span.span: Sets the index of the initial in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `SetIndex`控制項陣列中建立的初始項目時，應該只呼叫方法。The `SetIndex` method should only be called when you are creating the initial element in the control array. 若要將後續項目，呼叫方法並指定`Index`。To add subsequent elements, call the method and specify the `Index`. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的 是其他 的成員，`ShouldSerializeIndex` 會傳回 `false`。If the specified is a member of a different , `ShouldSerializeIndex` returns `false`. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
